trans-unit.source: Represents information about a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.

You can obtain identifying information for an initialized recognition engine using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode obter informações de identificação para um mecanismo de reconhecimento inicializado usando <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> objeto ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The information returned in instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> obtained from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> is determined by the settings in the **Speech Properties** member of the **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: As informações retornadas em instâncias do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> obtido um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> é determinado pelas configurações no **propriedades de fala** membro do **painel de controle**.

trans-unit.source: You can use instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> to construct a specific configuration of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar instâncias de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> para construir uma configuração específica do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo%29> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The static method <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> returns a list of all available <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instances.
trans-unit.target: O método estático <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> retorna uma lista de todas as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurações como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: The following example validates a given <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> and identifier string against the permitted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurations, expressed as a list of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir valida um determinado <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> e identificador de cadeia de caracteres em relação a permitido <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> configurações, expressadas como uma lista de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> objetos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> and identifier string are valid, the example creates a new instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> e cadeia de caracteres de identificador válido, o exemplo cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância como um argumento.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.

Returns an instance of <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> containing information about the configuration of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2" /> que contém informações sobre a configuração de um <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example below implements a button click which displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> do objeto em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: The key/value pairs contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instance returned by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.AdditionalInfo%2A> are concatenated into a text table.
trans-unit.target: Os pares de chave/valor contidos no <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instância retornada por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.AdditionalInfo%2A> são concatenados em uma tabela de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture supported by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
Returns information about the culture supported by a given <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre a cultura com suporte por um determinado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object can include the name of the culture, the associated language, the country/region, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objeto pode incluir o nome da cultura, o idioma associado, o país/região, o calendário usado e como formatar datas e cadeias de caracteres de classificação.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Culture%2A> property to obtain the identifying string for the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> used by the recognition engine configuration.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Culture%2A> propriedade para obter a identificação de cadeia de caracteres para o <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> usado pela configuração do mecanismo de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.

Returns a <see langword="string" /> that describes the configuration for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see langword="string" /> que descreve a configuração para um determinado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example below implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Description%2A> property to obtain the description of a speech recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Description%2A> propriedade para obter a descrição de uma configuração de mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala e, em seguida, exibe-o em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <c>RecognizerInfo</c> object.
Gets the identifier of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
Returns the identifier for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o identificador para um determinado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: The identifier returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property is the same as the token name of the recognition engine in the Windows registry.
trans-unit.target: O identificador retornado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> propriedade é o mesmo que o nome do token do mecanismo de reconhecimento no registro do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property to obtain the identifier string of a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> propriedade para obter a cadeia de caracteres de identificador de uma configuração do mecanismo de reconhecimento e, em seguida, exibe-o em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
Returns the friendly name for a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o nome amigável para um determinado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Name%2A> property to obtain the friendly name of a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Name%2A> propriedade para obter o nome amigável de uma configuração do mecanismo de reconhecimento e, em seguida, exibe-o em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio formats supported by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
Returns a list of audio formats supported by a specific <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista de formatos de áudio com suporte por um determinado <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a button click that displays all the information in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir implementa um clique do botão que exibe todas as informações em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> instância.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.SupportedAudioFormats%2A> property to obtain the encoding formats supported by a recognition engine configuration, and then displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.SupportedAudioFormats%2A> propriedade para obter os formatos de codificação com suporte por uma configuração do mecanismo de reconhecimento e, em seguida, exibe-o em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
